page.title: 19TOURISTS.
page.content: Many people visit this area during late spring,summer & autumn & the normally quiet country lanes may become relatively busy.Elderly people drive out to find a spot with a beautiful view where they can doze in the sunshine,knit or sit & read.The more energitic come to walk the moors or to have a stroll by a reservoir. The birdwatchers bring their binoculars to try & catch a glimpse of an unusual bird.The village of Bradfield is a favourite place for a days visit.When questioned,visitors said they come mainly because of the beautiful scenery & for the quietness & peace away from the busy city.They also like it because in a changing world it remains the same & unspoilt. However quite a few admitted that they would like a teashop here where they could find welcome refreshment.
